    • Uses of Recipe in com.revature.controllers

      Methods in com.revature.controllers that return Recipe 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Recipe RecipeController.printRecipeByRecipeId(int recipeId)
      Perform a GET request to /recipes/{id}, where {id} is the parameter to get all the recipes saved by the user.
      Methods in com.revature.controllers that return types with arguments of type Recipe 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Recipe> RecipeController.printAllRecipes()
      Perform a GET request to the endpoint /recipes to get all recipes stored in the database.
      java.util.List<Recipe> RecipeController.printRecipesByUserId(int userId)
      Mapped to the endpoint /recipes/users.
